Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: hasMapView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for an MKMapView object.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: findMapView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for an MKMapView object.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: loadViewControllerForUnitTest()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: tapBarButtonItem(withSystemItem:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the view controller’s navigationItem.leftBarButtonIttem, navigationItem.rightBarButtonItem, as well as the UIView hierarchy for a UIToolbar which may contain a UIBarButtonItem whose SystemItem matches the searchSystemItem and then attempts to tap the UIBarButtonItem by firing its associated target event, if one exists.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: tapLeftBarButtonItem()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Attempts to tap the view controller’s navigationItem.leftBarButtonItem UIBarButtonItem object regardless of what it is (so long as one exists) by firing its associated target event, if one exists.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: tapRightBarButtonItem()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Attempts to tap the view controller’s navigationItem.rightBarButtonItem UIBarButtonItem object regardless of what it is (so long as one exists) by firing its associated target event, if one exists.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: hasButton(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose title for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchText exactly.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: findButton(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose title for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchText exactly.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: tapButton(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose title for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchText exactly and then attempts to tap the button by sending a .touchUpInside event to it.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: hasButton(withImage:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose image for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchImage.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: findButton(withImage:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose image for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchImage.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: tapButton(withImage:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIButton whose image for UIControl.State.normal matches the searchImage and then attempts to tap the button by sending a .touchUpInside event to it.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: findButtons(withState:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for all UIButton objects whose state matches the indicated state.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: hasDatePickerView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIDatePicker object.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: findDatePickerView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIDatePicker object.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: hasImageView(withImage:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIImageView object whose image matches the provided search image.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: findImageView(withImage:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UIImageView object whose image matches the provided search image.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: countOfImages(_:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for all UIImageView objects whose image matches the provided search image.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: hasLabel(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UILabel whose text matches the searchText exactly.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: hasLabel(containingText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UILabel whose text contains the searchText.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: findLabel(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UILabel whose text matches the searchText exactly.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: findLabel(containingText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for a UILabel whose text contains the searchText.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: hasPickerView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: findPickerView()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: selectPickerRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView. If a UIPickerView is found, then it will attempt to search the title text for all rows of all columns for the specified search text. If a row title matching the search text is found, then that row will be selected.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: selectPickerRow(columnIndex:withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView. If a UIPickerView is found, then it will attempt to search the title text for each row of the indicated column index for the specified search text. If a row title matching the search text is found, then that row will be selected.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: hasPickerRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView. If a UIPickerView is found, then it will attempt to search the title text for all rows of all columns for the specified search text.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: hasSelectedPickerRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Searches the entire view hierarchy of a view controller’s primary view for any UIPickerView. If a UIPickerView is found, then it will attempt to search the title text for only the selected row of each column for the specified search text.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC8Suc.name: isNotATypeThatContainsAnInfiniteNumberOfSubviews
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC8Suc.abstract: When searching through the view hierarchy of a view, there appears to be times when some of Apple’s UIKit widgets contain an innfinite number of subviews. When these are encountered, Succinct can get stuck within this infinite view hierarchy causing problems when running tests.

Extensions/UITabBarController.html#/s:So.name: selectTab(withExactTitle:)
Extensions/UITabBarController.html#/s:So.abstract: Attempts to select a tab in a UITabBarController whose UITabBarItem title property matches the searchTitle text.

Extensions/UITabBarController.html#/s:So.name: selectedTab(isAKindOf:)
Extensions/UITabBarController.html#/s:So.abstract: Checks if the UITabBarController’s selectedViewController property matches the type passed in.

Extensions/UISwitch.html#/s:So8UISwitchC.name: isOff
Extensions/UISwitch.html#/s:So8UISwitchC.abstract: Convenience property which indicates if the UISwitch is off. This can be helpful when writing assertions as opposed to testing the isOn property.

Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/s:So12UIPi.name: selectRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/s:So12UIPi.abstract: Loops through all components (columns) of a UIPickerView and searches the title text for each row of the current column for the specified search text. If a row title matching the search text is found, then that row will be selected.

Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/s:So12UIPi.name: selectRow(columnIndex:withExactText:)
Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/s:So12UIPi.abstract: Loops through only the specified component (column) of a UIPickerView and searches the title text for each row for the specified search text. If a row title matching the search text is found, then that row will be selected.

Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/s:So12UIPi.name: hasRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/s:So12UIPi.abstract: Loops through all components (columns) of a UIPickerView and searches the title text for each row of each component (column) for the specified search text.

Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/s:So12UIPi.name: hasSelectedRow(withExactText:)
Extensions/UIPickerView.html#/s:So12UIPi.abstract: Loops through all components (columns) of a UIPickerView and searches the title text only for the selected row of each component (column) for the specified search text.

Extensions/UIControl.html#/s:So9UIContro.name: isDisabled
Extensions/UIControl.html#/s:So9UIContro.abstract: Convenience method which indicates if the control is disabled or not. This can be helpful when writing assertions as opposed to testing the isEnabled property.

Extensions/UIBarButtonItem.html#/s:So15U.name: systemItem
Extensions/UIBarButtonItem.html#/s:So15U.abstract: Convenience property for accessing the SystemItem for this UIBarButtonItem, if one has been set.

Extensions/UIBarButtonItem.html#/s:So15U.name: tap()
Extensions/UIBarButtonItem.html#/s:So15U.abstract: Attempts to tap this UIBarButtonItem object by firing its associated target event, if one exists.

Extensions/Optional.html#/s:Sq8SuccinctE.name: isNotNil()

Classes/SuccinctConfig.html#/s:8Succinct.name: disableDebugLog()
